headline: Spectrum launches bold new offer as cable TV customers flee
summary: Spectrum, which is operated by Charter Communications, has been fighting a massive consumer trend over the past few years that appears unlikely to end anytime soon. Many consumers nationwide have been cutting the cord on cable services as prices increase and the number of streaming services ...
